author: Gary Anderson
comment: Does not work on my 362 with latest build as of 12-29-2015. Update it won't refund me for this watch face.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Let me confirm, what is 362?
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

title: Does not work on 362

author: Jim Morris
comment: It says "WEAR Condition (Disconnected from your wear)"  What the Hell is that? I have reinstalled both Wear and the watch face.
title: It can't connect!

author: Robert Berger
comment: Well designed, take into consideration the bottom black strip on Moto 360, good color options. Latest update greatly improved battery life. Good work.
title: Love it.

author: Michael Nicolaides
comment: Goes great with a moto 360.  I can't recommend this guys work enough!  Top notch!
title: Excellent watch face!
